Notes: Discussed new Ethiopian Yirgacheffe launch. Customer excited about fruity notes. Agreed to initial order of 20 lbs. Follow-up: Send sample pack and pricing sheet.
Reviewed Q3 sales performance. Customer interested in increasing order volume for Q4. Decision: 15% volume increase. Action: Update contract and send for signature.
Introduced new eco-friendly packaging options. Customer keen on compostable bags for retail sales. Action: Send samples of new packaging and cost breakdown.
Addressed concerns about recent shipment delays. Explained new logistics partnership. Customer satisfied with solution. Follow-up: Monitor next two shipments closely.
Quarterly review meeting. Discussed upcoming holiday blends. Customer pre-ordered 100 lbs of Winter Wonderland blend. Action: Process pre-order and confirm shipping date.
Explored opportunity for co-branded coffee for customer's 10th anniversary. Decision: Move forward with custom blend creation. Next steps: Schedule tasting session for three proposed blends.
Addressed customer's interest in single-origin coffees. Provided overview of our direct trade relationships. Action: Arrange virtual meet-and-greet with one of our partner farmers.
Discussed potential for expanding into cold brew market. Customer interested but cautious. Decision: Start with small batch trial. Follow-up: Send cold brew equipment recommendations and recipes.
Reviewed customer's café equipment needs. Recommended upgrade to our new precision grinder. Decision: Customer will purchase 3 units. Action: Process order and arrange installation.

Addressed customer's concern about consistency across multiple locations. Proposed barista training program. Decision: Schedule training for 15 staff members. Action: Coordinate with training department for dates.
Introduced new loyalty program for wholesale customers. Customer very interested. Decision: Enroll in program starting next month. Action: Send enrollment forms and program details.
Discussed sustainability initiatives. Customer impressed with our carbon-neutral roasting process. Action: Provide marketing materials highlighting our eco-friendly practices for use in their café.
Quarterly business review. Sales up 20% YoY. Customer interested in expanding product range. Decision: Add our tea line to their offerings. Action: Send tea catalog and sampling kit.
Addressed recent quality control issue with espresso blend. Explained steps taken to prevent future occurrences. Customer satisfied with response. Action: Send replacement batch at no cost.

Explored opportunities for local event collaborations. Customer interested in hosting monthly coffee tasting events. Decision: Start with pilot event next month. Action: Draft event proposal and marketing plan.

Discussed customer's expansion plans. They're opening two new locations. Decision: Provide comprehensive coffee bar setup for both locations. Action: Arrange site visits and create custom equipment package.

Introduced new coffee subscription service for customer's retail customers. Customer excited about potential. Decision: Launch pilot program in one month. Action: Set up online portal and train staff on management.

Addressed customer's interest in offering more diverse brewing methods. Recommended pour-over bar setup. Decision: Start with trial in flagship store. Action: Design custom pour-over station and create training module.

Reviewed results of recent customer satisfaction survey. Identified areas for improvement in delivery speed. Decision: Implement new routing software. Action: Connect customer with our logistics team for streamlined deliveries.

Discussed potential for co-developed coffee-based beverages. Customer interested in exclusive coffee-infused ale. Decision: Move forward with R&D. Action: Set up meeting with our roasting team and customer's brewmaster.

Addressed customer's concern about market saturation. Proposed unique marketing angle focusing on coffee origin stories. Customer loved the idea. Action: Develop origin story materials for their top 5 selling coffees.

Quarterly account review. Identified opportunity to increase sales through improved in-store merchandising. Decision: Implement new display program. Action: Design custom point-of-sale displays for their stores.

Discussed customer's interest in coffee education for their staff. Proposed our 'Coffee Master' certification program. Decision: Enroll 5 key employees. Action: Send enrollment forms and schedule first training session.

Addressed customer's questions about coffee freshness and storage. Recommended our new vacuum-sealed packaging. Decision: Switch all orders to new packaging. Action: Update customer's account and send samples of new packaging.

Explored opportunity for expanding into office coffee service. Customer interested in pilot program for their corporate clients. Decision: Develop custom OCS package. Action: Create proposal for three-month trial with two corporate clients.

Discussed upcoming coffee harvest reports. Customer interested in securing premium micro-lots. Decision: Pre-book 1000 lbs of premium harvest. Action: Coordinate with sourcing team to reserve allocation.

Reviewed customer's equipment maintenance history. Recommended upgrade to our all-in-one espresso system. Decision: Upgrade three locations as trial. Action: Schedule installations and barista training for new system.

Addressed customer's interest in reducing waste. Introduced our coffee grounds recycling program. Customer excited to participate. Action: Set up recycling schedule and provide marketing materials about sustainability efforts.

Discussed potential for custom coffee blend for customer's high-end restaurant chain. Decision: Proceed with blend development. Action: Arrange tasting session with our master roaster and customer's culinary team.

Quarterly business review. Identified opportunity to increase sales through improved online presence. Decision: Develop co-branded online store. Action: Connect customer with our e-commerce team for platform setup.

Explored customer's interest in coffee-pairing events. Proposed collaboration with local chocolatier. Customer loved the idea. Action: Draft event series proposal and reach out to potential chocolate partner.

Addressed customer's concerns about consistency in cold brew. Recommended our new cold brew systems. Decision: Purchase system for flagship location as trial. Action: Process equipment order and schedule installation.

Discussed expansion of customer's private label program. Customer interested in adding single-serve options. Decision: Develop three SKUs for single-serve line. Action: Begin product development and design packaging.

Reviewed customer's coffee menu. Identified opportunity to increase profit margins with pour-over offerings. Decision: Add pour-over menu to all locations. Action: Develop training program and design new menu materials.

Addressed customer's interest in local marketing support. Proposed co-op advertising program. Customer eager to participate. Action: Develop localized marketing campaign for customer's five top-performing stores.

Discussed customer's interest in offering more non-dairy milk alternatives. Recommended our oat milk partner. Decision: Add oat milk option to all stores. Action: Update order to include oat milk and provide staff training materials.

Explored opportunity for coffee catering services. Customer interested in targeting local corporate events. Decision: Develop coffee catering package. Action: Create proposal including equipment, staffing, and menu options.

Addressed customer's questions about coffee certification programs. Provided overview of Fair Trade, Organic, and Rainforest Alliance. Decision: Transition two blends to fully certified offerings. Action: Begin certification process for selected blends.

Quarterly account review. Identified opportunity to increase sales with new seasonal drink program. Decision: Implement rotating seasonal specials. Action: Develop recipes and point-of-sale materials for upcoming winter drinks.

Discussed customer's interest in reducing energy costs. Recommended our energy-efficient equipment upgrade program. Decision: Audit and upgrade equipment in three stores. Action: Schedule energy audits and create upgrade proposal.

Explored potential for coffee-themed merchandise line. Customer excited about branded goods. Decision: Start with branded cups and bags. Action: Connect customer with our merchandise team to begin design process.

Addressed customer's interest in exclusive coffee offerings. Proposed micro-lot program with first rights on small batch coffees. Customer very interested. Action: Develop proposal for micro-lot subscription program.

Discussed customer's expansion into airport locations. Recommended streamlined menu and equipment package. Decision: Proceed with airport-specific planning. Action: Create custom proposal for airport coffee kiosk setup.

Reviewed customer's social media presence. Identified opportunity for improvement. Decision: Collaborate on social media strategy. Action: Set up meeting with our marketing team to develop content calendar and guidelines.

Addressed customer's interest in coffee cocktails for evening service. Proposed coffee cocktail training program. Customer excited to proceed. Action: Schedule bartender training session and develop recipe book.

Explored opportunity for co-branded coffee truck for events. Customer very interested in concept. Decision: Develop pilot program for summer events. Action: Create business plan for coffee truck operation and design mock-ups.
Discussed customer's interest in expanding tea offerings. Recommended our premium tea line. Decision: Add full tea line to menu. Action: Arrange tea tasting and training session for customer's staff.

Addressed customer's questions about coffee freshness. Proposed switch to smaller, more frequent deliveries. Decision: Implement weekly delivery schedule. Action: Update logistics plan and coordinate with delivery team.

Quarterly business review. Identified opportunity to increase sales through improved customer loyalty program. Decision: Upgrade to our new digital loyalty platform. Action: Begin loyalty program transition and staff training.

Explored potential for coffee education classes for customer's clients. Customer excited about adding value for their customers. Decision: Develop monthly coffee education series. Action: Create curriculum and marketing materials for coffee classes.
